name: kaggle_search
description: Search Kaggle across all content types (datasets, competitions, notebooks, models). Returns titles, URLs, and descriptions from the unified search page.

steps.code: const results = []; const seen = new Set(); document.querySelectorAll('a[href]').forEach(a => { const href = a.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (seen.has(href) || !href.startsWith('/')) return; const isDataset = href.match(/^\/datasets\/[^/]+\/[^/]+/); const isComp = href.match(/^\/competitions\/[^/]+$/); const isCode = href.match(/^\/code\/[^/]+\/[^/]+/); const isModel = href.match(/^\/models\/[^/]+\/[^/]+/); if (!isDataset && !isComp && !isCode && !isModel) return; const title = a.textContent.trim(); if (!title || title.length > 200 || title.length < 3) return; seen.add(href); let type = 'unknown'; if (isDataset) type = 'dataset'; else if (isComp) type = 'competition'; else if (isCode) type = 'notebook'; else if (isModel) type = 'model'; const parent = a.closest('li') || a.parentElement; const desc = parent ? Array.from(parent.querySelectorAll('span,p')).map(e => e.textContent.trim()).filter(t => t.length > 20 && t !== title).slice(0, 1).join('') : ''; results.push({ title: title.substring(0, 200), url: 'https://www.kaggle.com' + href, type, description: desc.substring(0, 300) }); }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results: results.slice(0, 20) };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
